name: Bank Delivery
description: Deliver paperwork from the Bank to the Library

name: Courier Errand
description: Deliver a package from Sam to the Gym

name: Beach Delivery
description: Pick up sunglasses from the Mall and bring them to the Beach

name: Mayor Letter
description: Take a letter from the Mayor to the Library

name: Alice's Concert
description: Attend a show with Alice at the Theater

name: Bella's Necklace
description: Find Bella's lost necklace near the Forest

name: Chris's Training
description: Spar with Chris at the Gym

name: Spring Festival
description: Join the planting contest at the Farm

name: Summer Festival
description: Win tokens at the Beach party

name: Fall Festival
description: Help harvest crops for the town

name: Dog Walk
description: Take your Dog for a joyful run in the Park
dialogue: Your dog looks eager to stretch its legs.
Maybe the park would be fun.
objectives: Visit the park with your Dog

name: Cat Curiosity
description: Let your Cat explore the mysteries of the Library
dialogue: Your cat gazes toward the shelves.
Perhaps a trip to the library?
objectives: Study at the library with your Cat

name: Parrot Echo
description: Teach your Parrot new words at the Shop
objectives: Visit the shop with your Parrot

name: Llama Trek
description: Go on a countryside trek with your Llama
objectives: Travel to the farm with your Llama

name: Peacock Parade
description: Show off your Peacock at the Town Hall
objectives: Visit the town hall with your Peacock

name: Rhino Charge
description: Train your Rhino's charge at the Gym
dialogue: The rhino paws at the ground.
objectives: Work out at the gym with your Rhino
